website_summaries.verdict: This toaster doesn't have a lot of bells and whistles, but it makes a good and consistent piece of toast without taking up too much space on your countertop.
pros: Wide slots can handle bagels easily
Easy to adjust to your preferred toasting level
cons: This toaster seems to not toast as evenly as some of the more expensive models

customer_reviews.title: “Medium” setting burnt the bread, but properly adjusted, it works fine.
customer_reviews.text: The toaster settings do not match what is recommended in the manual. We started at 4 and the bread burned (just standard sandwich bread). We have got it set at just above 2 for our preferred toast, which is a medium dark brown. The spring is a bit strong as well. More than one slice of bread has flown completely out of the toaster, so don’t keep close to the edge of the counter or your toast may end up on the floor. Otherwise, it works very well. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer T. Helton

customer_reviews.title: Cool style, poor functionality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I liked the design, but when actually using it I found the temperature control to be very inconsistent and the "bagel" function did not toast evenly, burning the outside more than the inside on each half. And if that wasn't enough, the toaster launches the bread or bagel out of the slots and onto the counter when I hit "cancel."
customer_reviews.author: D. Chang

customer_reviews.title: Best toaster ever
customer_reviews.text: I love my toaster I was looking for a while to find something in a cream color to go with my kitchen I am buying everything new I just relocated but every time I looked at wanting color it was like a hundred and something dollars so I came across this and I consider myself lucky the toast Cook's perfectly sometimes when I'm in a rush I tend not cook so evenly but that is on me not the toaster
customer_reviews.author: CECELIA

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: My old ironing board is a bit oversized so it is usually a struggle to fit a cover. This one went on very easily and then adjusted to tighten up and fit. It is nice and thick, I’m very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Bad Design
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toaster in March of 2020 and it only lasted 6 months. I noticed my toast/waffles were getting severel;y burned on one of the slots, then when all of a sudden, these wires came out. I tried to carefully put them back in, but it is too dangerous. Too bad, because it's super cute and I love the vintage design.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Schulte

customer_reviews.title: CUTE, but didn’t toast very well
customer_reviews.text: Super cute toaster that would’ve looked great in my kitchen, but it only toasted bread on one side (both slots) — and NO, I didn’t mistakingly have it on the bagel setting! :)
customer_reviews.author: jfree99

customer_reviews.title: Nice Look and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I've always had difficulty with using those super fancy toasters, so I went with this. Has a few simple modes and settings; that's it, and that's all I need.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ivory color has yellow butter hue.
customer_reviews.text: Great little toaster. It does tend to toast a little more on one side, but overall does a great job. I ordered the ivory and it has more of a creamy yellow hue than off-white so it doesn’t match my kitchen wood trim/cupboards , so I store it in the pantry. Wish I order the black color instead.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne

customer_reviews.title: Broke, replaced immediately!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this toaster. Pretty, makes great toast. It stopped working after 8 months, and after a quick email to the company they had a new one in the mail the same day! No questions asked! Great customer service!!!! Made a repeat customer out of me 😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does everything you expect from this style toaster.
customer_reviews.text: Accommodates wide slices of artisanal bread, has a bagel setting. Really toasts!
customer_reviews.author: Poodle mom 3

customer_reviews.title: bad quality
customer_reviews.text: The shape and color are my favorite, but it took 4 months to break, and the quality is too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Lite weight
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and does a great job toasting.
customer_reviews.author: eclectus

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking
customer_reviews.text: It looks good on the counter. We found one side of the toast was darker than the other. Apparently this is common with new toasters. In a follow-up e-mail we learned to always toast two pieces for even front and back color.
customer_reviews.author: Gary H.

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Nice while it lasted but after 13 months the levers don't go down anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Charming, simple, broken
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 5 months, wanting a replacement. The lever springs back up, won't stay down. So sad, cuz we loved this toaster! Keemo, are you there? Amazon says the windows for returning have closed.
customer_reviews.author: Idleeyes

customer_reviews.title: Beauty meets sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with this toaster !! Elegant look, built solid, rubber base grips keep it in place; and toaster settings very accurate . Blows away 10 other brands I looked at !
customer_reviews.author: Colette Cleve

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but burns food.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good sitting on the counter. Tends to burn everything.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Dwain Denniston

customer_reviews.title: Clicking doesn’t bother me!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the clicking noise when I change the degrees of toastiness
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome appliance
customer_reviews.text: It works perfect! I like the color matches my water kettle
customer_reviews.author: alicia garza

customer_reviews.title: It looks great
customer_reviews.text: It’s absolutely beautiful & works just fine It’s everything I expected 😁
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Resendez

customer_reviews.title: Superior toaster!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent toaster! Note: the bagel function uses the outside elements only, so put the sliced side outward. This in counter/intuitive, since most toasters use the center elements only for bagels. I also use the bagel function to toast hamburger buns. Use 4 for whole wheat,?3 for white bread/buns. Darkness control numbers are a little hard to see. Could benefit from ejection alarm for cooks who are busy doing other things besides toasting, and can’t constantly monitor the toaster. With all this, I still consider it a superior toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Toasts Evenly Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I had a very expensive Breville that quit working shortly after I bought it. I was looking for a toaster that toasted evenly and consistently like the Breville. This fits the bill perfectly. The toaster looks nice on the counter, the toasting is even, the machine is quiet. The only thing that was a surprise is that the toast pops up and out of the toaster like an erupting volcano. It's not a big problem and it is kind of funny. I would recommend this toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed by the cheap product. Looks like was made for one dollar in some obscure factory. Does not have a one slice feature. Looks pretty on the countertop, so I guess that's something.
customer_reviews.author: Catwoman

customer_reviews.title: Quality is not there.
customer_reviews.text: The look is great, but much like other reviews for this toaster, it does not toast properly or consistently. Even at the lowest setting you run the risk of burning your toast.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel J. Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toast slice
customer_reviews.text: I know some reviews say toast flies out of toaster but mine just pops out like a alpha toaster that he is and gives me a perfect slice of toast every time. No issues here!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Davis

customer_reviews.title: works nice and looks good
customer_reviews.text: The toaster works just fine and is very nice looking. My only regret is that it doesn't come in white so it looks dirty against my white appliances. But the item is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Nickac1970

customer_reviews.title: IT is NOT cool touch -  be careful
customer_reviews.text: this toaster gets really really hot on the outside? How can they say this is cool touch ? eeeeeks
customer_reviews.author: c moore

customer_reviews.title: Very good item
customer_reviews.text: I like the classic look, and it's easy to use my grandmother loves it
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toaster. And it looks super pretty. Toasts perfect. Very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: D Stubbs

customer_reviews.title: Retro style cuttest toaster + works perfect
customer_reviews.text: Best toaster physically and in functionality it’s worth every dollar spent.
customer_reviews.author: MAC

product_meta.title: Compact Small Bread Bagel Toasters 2 Slice, Wide Slot Stainless Steel Kitchen Toaster, Cream

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars54 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
